{"blocks":[{"key":"4a416","text":"Blocking/Permeabilizing: incubate cells blocking/permeabilizing buffer ( 2% BSA + 0.1 % triton X-100 in PBS 1X) for    ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":25}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":116,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":117,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"86hln","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a47er","text":"During blocking make and spin the antibody (ab) mix. Each coverslip needs ~40-50 uL uL of ab mix. Antibodies are diluted in Blocking buffer ( 2% BSA in PBS 1X ) and spun at      m    to clear aggregates. Remove spun ab and place in new tube. Mix to get even concentration. HERE: we used 1:200 rabbit polyclonal anti-FLAG DYKDDDDK tag – (ptg labs Cat no : 20543-1-AP) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":174,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":176,"length":1},{"key":4,"offset":180,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"64mu2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1200,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}},"3":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"4":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"50000","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"45pba","text":"Quenching: 2X rinse and 2x  of 0.4% NH4Cl   in PBS 1X","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":11}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":27,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":42,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3fkom","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"75","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3mig0","text":"Lay one 22 mm x 22 mm glass coverlsip into each 35 mm dish or 6 well. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dfqqk","text":"Find areas with transfected cells. Acquire Z stacks by determining top and bottom with a 0.3 um step size. (about 20-25 z stacks)  ·","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"de0kg","text":"Analysis in Fiji:  Go through each image, make max projections, and mark each transfected cells with a ROI (region of interest).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"85c06","text":"In an excel sheet keep track of each cell you mark and score as 0 if no LRRK2 filaments are present or 1 if some are.  ·","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"18eu3","text":"Include at least 50 cells/ sample.  ·","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ejec6","text":"Calculate % cells with filaments (number of transfected cells with filaments /total number of transfected cells *100) ·","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4khhq","text":"Unblind","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4ddso","text":"Transfer values to prism to generate graph and statistics.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
